data.title: The Gods of Mars Audiobook
data.meta_description: Book 2 of the Barsoom Series - It's been ten years. Ten long years of separation from his inestimable princess and his beloved Mars. data.text:
Summary

Book 2 of the Barsoom Series - It's been ten years. Ten long years of separation from his inestimable princess and his beloved Mars. But now, John Carter is suddenly thrust back to him red home. But it's not the loving embrace of Dejah Throis that he finds himself returned. Instead, it's to dangers, perils, and evil gods that will stop at nothing to destroy him.

Can John Carter find his way back to his princess in time?

This classic work from beloved author Edgar Rice Burroughs is brought to life by Another World Audiobooks through the vocal talent of Brady Smith, The Gods of Mars is a joy to listen to and the perfect way to experience it for the first time or relive your enjoyment of this classic work from Edgar Rice Burroughs.

If you enjoy this, be sure to check out more works from Edgar Rick Burroughs & other classics on the Another World Audiobooks Podcast (for free!), available anywhere you get your podcasts!

Want a FREE audiobook? As a 'thank you' for your purchase, I'd love to give you a free audiobook from the Another World library! Just click here - https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd2qyhq43ihF5Jt4aJtji0gN6SajuhHb5Ta6sxjM7YqMHfzjA/viewform - and pick the book you'd like!

--------------------

Check out AnotherWorldAudiobooks.com! There's so much more to explore - tons of awesome content, a fun community of fellow audiobook lovers, cool merchandise, & more!

Get in touch & tell us what you think - AnotherWorldAudiobooks@gmail.com

Check out the podcast on iTunes or your podcast player of choice - just search "Another World Audiobooks"!
